prompts: Create a majestic dragon-like Pokemon with shimmering blue scales and crystal accents.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of time and space with metallic features.
Imagine a powerful steel-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and unique spiky elements.
Generate a mythical creature that can manipulate time, looking both ancient and futuristic.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur, with icy blue hues and intricate armoring.
Give me a creature that blends futuristic technology with natural elements in its appearance.
Make a Pokemon that stands proud and regal, showcasing its dominance in any battle.
